name: fresh-water
effect: Used on a party Pokémon : Restores 50 HP.

flavor_text.sun_moon: Water with a high mineral content. When consumed, it restores up to 30 HP to an injured Pokémon.
flavor_text.ultra_sun_ultra_moon: Water with a high mineral content. When consumed, it restores up to 30 HP to an injured Pokémon.
flavor_text.lets_go_pikachu_lets_go_eevee: Water with high mineral content. It can be used to restore 30 HP to a single Pokémon.
